snippet: Daniel Briere scored off a rebound with four-tenths of a second left in regulation to lift the Avalanche to a 2-1 win over the Bruins.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Briere scored off a rebound with four-tenths of a second left in regulation to lift the Avalanche to a 2-1 win over the Bruins.

headline.main: Avalanche Top Bruins on Briere Goal in Final Second
headline.print_headline: Avalanche Top Bruins on Briere Goal in Final Second
